language-bar.title: Language dropdown list. Selected item: {{x}}. Click here to open the list.

landing.countdown-desc: Up to 25% discount for new members

gift.redeem: Use this code to redeem your gift card
gift.title: Massage Therapy Card
gift.desc: Would you like to treat yourself or someone you know to a great massage or something from our gift shop? A gift card from Massage Therapy is the perfect gift for any holiday. Available in several different quantities to suit any budget, this is the perfect gift for birthdays, anniversaries, special occasions or for employees.

register.title: Register
register.success: Confirmation email was sent to the address that you have entered.
register.failure: Something went wrong when trying to register you.
register.after: Please check your email box and follow instructions.

confirmEmail.thanks: Thank you for confirming the email
confirmEmail.after: Please log in using your credentials
confirmEmail.failure: Looks like your email was not confirmed timely. Please try to register once more

login.title: Login
login.failure: Oops, something went wrong when logging you in.

remind.title: Remind password
remind.success: Link was sent to your email
remind.failure: Something went wrong when sending the link to your email
remind.after: Please check your email box and follow instructions

reset.title: Change password
reset.failure: Oops, something went wrong when updating your password
reset.after: Please login using your new password
